name: wifi-signal-plus
description: GNOME Shell extension displaying WiFi generation (4/5/6/7) with detailed info

scripts.copy-assets: cp metadata.json stylesheet.css dist/ && cp -r src/icons dist/
scripts.install-extension: npm run build && rm -rf ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/wifi-signal-plus@jalil.arfaoui.net && cp -r dist ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/wifi-signal-plus@jalil.arfaoui.net
scripts.nested: npm run install-extension && MUTTER_DEBUG_DUMMY_MODE_SPECS=1920x1080 dbus-run-session gnome-shell --devkit --wayland
scripts.reload: npm run install-extension && gnome-extensions disable wifi-signal-plus@jalil.arfaoui.net 2>/dev/null; gnome-extensions enable wifi-signal-plus@jalil.arfaoui.net
scripts.pack: npm run build && cd dist && gnome-extensions pack --extra-source=icons --extra-source=wifiInfo.js --extra-source=wifiGeneration.js --extra-source=types.js --force --out-dir=..
